feature_model.name: UI
feature_model.feature_tree: :r UI (f_UI) :m Consumer Report (f_Consumer_Report) :m Temperature (f_Temperature) :m Generate Reports (f_Generate_Reports) :m On-Off Light (f_On_Off_Light) :m On-Off Water (f_On_Off_Water) :m Log (f_Log) :m Platform (f_Platform) :m Alarms (f_Alarms) :m Alarm No water (f_Alarm_No_water) :m Alarm No lights (f_Alarm_No_lights) :m GreenHouse (f_GreenHouse) :m Control (f_Control) :m Mode (f_Mode) :m Monitoring (f_Monitoring) :m Notification (f_Notification) :o Graphic (f_Graphic) :o Mobile Interface (f_Mobile_Interface) :o Mobile (f_Mobile) :o Web Interface (f_Web_Interface) :o Web (f_Web) :o PC Interface (f_PC_Interface) :o PC (f_PC) :o Console (f_Console) :o SMS (f_SMS) :o e-mail (f_e_mail) :o Day (f_Day) :o Night (f_Night) :o Production Report (f_Production_Report) :o Others Alarms (f_Others_Alarms) :o Call phone (f_Call_phone)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_Console or ~f_Graphic constraint_2:~f_Console or ~f_Mobile constraint_3:~f_Console or ~f_PC constraint_4:~f_Console or ~f_Web constraint_5:~f_Console or ~f_Mobile_Interface constraint_6:~f_Console or ~f_PC_Interface constraint_7:~f_Console or ~f_Web_Interface
